name: Nightmare Runner (itch)
description:
Corrupt the minds of the sleeping innocents before they awaken! In this 2D Platformer, speedrun through intricate levels to destroy the victim's vital organs, and corrupt their brain before they wake up. Nightmare Runner was made by six Michigan State University students for the Spartasoft Fall 2022 48 Hour Game Jam, based around the theme "Dream"!

Our Team:

Producer, Lead Designer - Drew Cook

Background and UI Artist - Atu Ngasala

Lead Technical Artist / Designer - Aidan Bieber

Lead Programmer, Sound Designer - Blake BeMent

Designer - Dani Cervera 

Artist and Designer - Joseph Pacentine

Music and SFX used from https://www.zapsplat.com/
